titles: To the Right Honourable, the Supreme Court of Parliament. The humble petition of the sentinels in the regiment formerly belonging to Major General Goffe.
notes: Praying that their arrears of pay may be made good to them, etc.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Soldiers --  England --  Pay, allowances, etc. --  Early works to 1800.
